name: Misled
content: Thought that i knew you well
But i guess you never can tell
永远不要忽视那些迹象
将一切萦绕在我心中并不值得
Just a page in my history
你只能是我记忆的一页
Just another one of those mysteries
One more lover that used to be
If you think you're in my head
如果你认为你还在我心里
爱上某人不是容易的事情
爱需要信念 需要生存的意志
